org.apache.storm.topology

インタフェース IRichSpout

  • すべてのスーパーインタフェース:
    IComponent, ISpout, Serializable
    既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    BaseRichSpout, BlobStoreAPIWordCountTopology.RandomSentenceSpout, CheckpointSpout, ClojureSpout, DRPCSpout, EventHubSpout, FastWordCountTopology.FastRandomSentenceSpout, FeederSpout, FixedTupleSpout, FluxShellSpout, HdfsSpout, InOrderDeliveryTest.InOrderSpout, KafkaSpout, KafkaSpout, MasterBatchCoordinator, MqttSpout, PythonShellMetricsSpout, RandomIntegerSpout, RandomSentenceSpout, RichShellSpout, RichSpoutBatchTriggerer, SpoutTracker, TestEventLogSpout, TestPlannerSpout, TestWordSpout, ThroughputVsLatency.FastRandomSentenceSpout, TransactionalSpoutCoordinator, TwitterSampleSpout, WordCountTopologyNode.RandomSentence

    public interface IRichSpout
extends ISpout, IComponent

    When writing topologies using Java, IRichBolt and IRichSpout are the main interfaces to use to implement components of the topology.

    • メソッドのサマリー

      • インタフェースから継承されたメソッド org.apache.storm.spout.ISpout

        ack, activate, close, deactivate, fail, nextTuple, open

      • インタフェースから継承されたメソッド org.apache.storm.topology.IComponent

        declareOutputFields, getComponentConfiguration
